app_name: Groups Control Groups Voice Recording and Karaoke Apps Pendar
app_description: Never forget your ideas again! With Pendar you can quickly capture and organise the ideas that pop up in your head. Use the voice recorder to transcribe your thoughts and send them to your favourite to do app or any other collection app. Whether you are on a run on your bike or in your car ideas can come up anytime anywhere. Pendar lets you quickly capture your ideas through voice text or photos and save them. You can set up workflows that allow you to easily send them to the appropriate location to continue with the idea. Be it a to do app or an issue logging tool. With one click you can send your ideas through! PRIVACY All ideas captured by Pendar are saved on your phone and to your personal iCloud storage to which only you have access to so nobody but you can access these. TERMS OF USE You can find the terms of use here: https: www.apple.com legal internet services itunes dev stdeula
